title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Perhaps you dive deeper into activities and subjects that both fascinate and frighten you today. Youre ready to take a hobby or passing interest to the next level by committing more time and money to it. However, you might not be entirely sure about probing new depths that make you nervous. But youre safer than you think while the sustaining Taurus Moon in your 5th House of Pleasure forms a protective trine to profound Pluto. You only need to trust that youre deserving and capable of reaping the richness of your intense efforts. Explore your passion to your hearts content. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
